graphql.query:
query Me {
  me {
    id
    firstName
    lastName
    username
    password
    email
    mobile
    phone
    address
    active
    lastLogin
    lastPasswordChange
    token
    role {
      id
      accessLevel
      name
      updatedAt
      deletedAt
      createdAt
      users {
        id
        firstName
        lastName
        username
        password
        email
        mobile
        phone
        address
        active
        lastLogin
        lastPasswordChange
        token
        role {
          id
          accessLevel
          name
          updatedAt
          deletedAt
          createdAt
        }
        createdAt
        deletedAt
        updatedAt
      }
    }
    createdAt
    deletedAt
    updatedAt
  }
}

query Users($usersPagination: UserPagination) {
  users(pagination: $usersPagination) {
    users {
      id
      firstName
      lastName
      username
      password
      email
      mobile
      phone
      address
      active
      lastLogin
      lastPasswordChange
      token
      role {
        id
        accessLevel
        name
        updatedAt
        deletedAt
        createdAt
        users {
          id
          firstName
          lastName
          username
          password
          email
          mobile
          phone
          address
          active
          lastLogin
          lastPasswordChange
          token
          createdAt
          deletedAt
          updatedAt
        }
      }
      createdAt
      deletedAt
      updatedAt
    }
    total
  }
}

mutation CreateRole($createRoleInput: RoleCreateInput!) {
  createRole(input: $createRoleInput) {
    role {
      id
      accessLevel
      name
      updatedAt
      deletedAt
      createdAt
      users {
        id
        firstName
        lastName
        username
        password
        email
        mobile
        phone
        address
        active
        lastLogin
        lastPasswordChange
        token
        role {
          id
          accessLevel
          name
          updatedAt
          deletedAt
          createdAt
        }
        createdAt
        deletedAt
        updatedAt
      }
    }
  }
}

mutation CreateUser($createUserInput: UserCreateInput!) {
  createUser(input: $createUserInput) {
    user {
      id
      firstName
      lastName
      username
      password
      email
      mobile
      phone
      address
      active
      lastLogin
      lastPasswordChange
      token
      role {
        id
        accessLevel
        name
        updatedAt
        deletedAt
        createdAt
        users {
          id
          firstName
          lastName
          username
          password
          email
          mobile
          phone
          address
          active
          lastLogin
          lastPasswordChange
          token
          createdAt
          deletedAt
          updatedAt
        }
      }
      createdAt
      deletedAt
      updatedAt
    }
  }
}
